publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7240.1 Karen Gillon: Scotland’s Engagement with Malawi—As an amendment to motion (S3M-7240) in the name of Linda Fabiani, leave out from "and organisations" to end and insert ", schools, educational institutions, businesses and health service organisations, as well as the collaborative efforts of the Scottish Malawi Partnership, who have worked hard to strengthen links and who have given their time and support so generously."
S3M-7240.1 Scotland’s Engagement with Malawi (lodged on 29 October 2010) Sarah Boyack*
